headline: What Generac Holdings (GNRC)'s Margin Squeeze and Slower Growth Means For Shareholders
summary: In recent months, Generac Holdings, a provider of residential, commercial, and industrial power products, has faced scrutiny as its annual revenue growth slowed to 4.2%, operating margins compressed, and returns on capital weakened. This combination of softer growth metrics and declining profitability, alongside a forward P/E multiple of 22.9 times, is prompting investors to reassess how much they are willing to pay for Generac’s earnings power. We’ll examine how Generac’s weakening...
